channel.title: [718] DragonScape Infinity! No lag 24/7 Need Staff!
channel.description:
[DragonScape Infinity!!!]24/7 Webclient, Updates, events, No lag/rollbacks, 718 graphics, Good economy, Good xp rates, Nice staff, Active Community, Need Staff
[center]Please use the link next to Download Client:
Web Client: [url=https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=dragonscape%20infinity]https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=dragonscape%20infinity[/url]
Download Client: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/93849532/DragonScape%20Infinity.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/93849532/DragonScape%20Infinity.jar[/url]
Alpha Client: [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/93849532/DragonScape%20Infinity%20Alpha.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/93849532/DragonScape%20Infinity%20Alpha.jar[/url]
Website(outdated): [url=http://DragonScape742.webs.com]DragonScape742.webs.com[/url][/center]
DragonScape Infinity is a exciting brand new 718 server with many features here are just a few things that set us apart from other servers:
1st and foremost we listen to our players and develop DragonScape Infinity accordingly to their feedback and/or requests:
- We allow players who have programming skills to design their own content and submit it to a ftp server
- If you dont have programming skills you may still make a request directly or submit it
2nd new players can always find help very fast and will not be ignored by staff:
- Staff is selected by who is the most useful to the server NOT who beggs the most this motivates many players to help newcomers
3rd DragonScape Infinity is part of a server network other servers being run in the network include: - Team Fortress 2 Mvm - Minecraft Tekkit Classic - Ftp Server - TeamSpeak 3 Server
4th DragonScape Infinity players have the option of using the teamspeak server for voice chat!
- Ip: TwilightNova.no-ip.biz
For those who opened this post because they wanted to be staff here are a few things you should know:
- Staff is chosen NOT requested make yourself a know part of the community and be helpful to all new players. - Maturity matters not how old you are but how you choose to act. - You will NOT be chosen if you continuously choose to fight with other players/staff. - People who possess some kind of computer skill will have increased chances of being chosen for staff: Graphics design, Animation, Codeing, Modeling, Web design - People who help with the development of the server will have increased chances of being chosen for staff download the alpha client to help in development.
[center]here are just a few of the features of DragonScape Infinity[/center]
[center]Features[/center] [center]-------------------------[/center] [center] Prestiging - 10 prestige levels no shop yet. Loyalty System w/shop Wings all work Squeal of Fortune 99% Money Pouch clue Scrolls File Implemented but not finished Grotworms Dungeon Polypore Dungeon Level Points with shop The ability to click a skill and either open a shop or teleport to the training location. Clan Wars all portals 100% Character Design Troll Invasion minigame Zombies Minigame Working Runespan - glitchy all skill trainable Player Owned Homes - with the ability to make objects, they dont show up but you can train construction by continuously remaking stuff Sawmill operator 100% all working curses Completionists cape stand working Torva/Pernix/Virtus degrade and can be repaired Quest system added Commands file tweaked/fixed ::sellall command Over 1500 NPCs Spawned all skill interfaces fixed Teleport Crystal Pking is near perfected Donator zone Extreme Donator Zone Halfway done Lots more cant remember it all.... Pk/skill ECO Shops perfected Lucky Items and their special attacks/stats
Npc's King Black Dragon (737 one) Queen Black Dragon Tormented Demons with all prayers and attacks Nex Full Godwars Dungeon, with teleports and working altars ( with timers ) Corporeal beast Frost dragons Dominion Tower Glacors Nomads Requim Bork The Inadequancy The Illusive Kalphite Queen All stages and attacks
+ all matrix features + more.
Changelog (oudated atleast 3 months): -------------------------------------
Fixed Skillcape/Maxcape shop Added Set Exchange Added 7 Custom Items, 6 NPC potions 1 Death Door position that all but kills the user Added Sever Panel Fixed Inadequincy More Item Functionality Meaning Emotes for Flared Trousers, Powder Wig, Etc. Fixed bullshit where buying stuff and it stealy your money, and gives you nothing You can buy a double XP fishing pendent that gives you double fishing XP Bookcases give you a helpful book that takes you to forums or gives you commands After 10 Combat prestiges, you receive a Grandmaster ring which gives you a +50 Bonus You can upgrade Iron, Mith, and Rune Scimitars now. Food is sold noted Inadequcy has been moved and given drops Added double xp Agility pendent Agile Set has been added to set exchange Made Polypore Staff more powerful Dig with spade after doing ::home and get a pet kitten Fixed Teleports Added Money Chest Veng group is donators Fixed Farming Fixed Slayer Added Hunting Added Donor Shops and Recoler Shop (Donor Only) Added Fighter Torso to Level Point Shop Added Black Partyhat and Black Whip Added more features to donorzone Added ::gfx_id Added ::emote_id Added ::newspell Added ::dice
changelog continued 9/26/2013: Added player owned shops (donators) Allow players to buy properties within game Fixed gates to open properly [/center]
Donators can own shops: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/v6tf5z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/dlnbfc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2hoa91w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/730xgg.png[/img]
Players can own strcutures in the game: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/15dmf51.png[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/wtddnr.png[/img]
DragonScape Infinity: [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2zpuu6f.png[/img]
DragonScape Infinity Alpha: [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2czy8fq.png[/img]
credits: jagex (maps items npcs basically everything you see when you log in) matrix (for client so you can log in and server so the client knows what to do in the world) other guy who had this server last me for a couple years developing the server and making sure things actually function properly

item.title: [718] DragonScape Infinity! No lag 24/7 Need Staff!
item.dc:creator: @thakillah thakillah
item.description:
@thakillah wrote:

[quote=“Roar337, post:3, topic:532996”][quote author=thakillah link=topic=651791.msg4369367#msg4369367 date=1380303595]
Nothing new anyway matrix didn’t make the client… they made the source. Good luck thought.
[/quote]

seriously where have you seen the shops and property thing before?[/quote]

Except for those but those are just small things good job on it thought.

Read full topic

item.title: [718] DragonScape Infinity! No lag 24/7 Need Staff!
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

[DragonScape Infinity!!!]24/7 Webclient, Updates, events, No lag/rollbacks, 718 graphics, Good economy, Good xp rates, Nice staff, Active Community, Need Staff

[center]Please use the link next to Download Client:

Web Client:
https://www.rspscoding.org/play/?server=dragonscape%20infinity

Download Client:
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/93849532/DragonScape%20Infinity.jar

Alpha Client:
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/93849532/DragonScape%20Infinity%20Alpha.jar

Website(outdated):
DragonScape742.webs.com[/center]

DragonScape Infinity is a exciting brand new 718 server with many features here are just a few things that set us apart from other servers:

1st and foremost we listen to our players and develop DragonScape Infinity accordingly to their feedback and/or requests:

  • We allow players who have programming skills to design their own content and submit it
    to a ftp server

  • If you dont have programming skills you may still make a request directly or submit it

2nd new players can always find help very fast and will not be ignored by staff:

  • Staff is selected by who is the most useful to the server NOT who beggs the most this motivates many players to help newcomers

3rd DragonScape Infinity is part of a server network other servers being run in the network include:

  • Team Fortress 2 Mvm
  • Minecraft Tekkit Classic
  • Ftp Server
  • TeamSpeak 3 Server

4th DragonScape Infinity players have the option of using the teamspeak server for voice chat!

  • Ip: TwilightNova.no-ip.biz

For those who opened this post because they wanted to be staff here are a few things you should know:

  • Staff is chosen NOT requested make yourself a know part of the community and be helpful to all new players.
  • Maturity matters not how old you are but how you choose to act.
  • You will NOT be chosen if you continuously choose to fight with other players/staff.
  • People who possess some kind of computer skill will have increased chances of being chosen for staff: Graphics design, Animation, Codeing, Modeling, Web design
  • People who help with the development of the server will have increased chances of being chosen for staff download the alpha client to help in development.

[center]here are just a few of the features of DragonScape Infinity[/center]

[center]Features[/center]
[center]-------------------------[/center]
[center]
Prestiging - 10 prestige levels no shop yet.
Loyalty System w/shop
Wings all work
Squeal of Fortune
99% Money Pouch
clue Scrolls File Implemented but not finished
Grotworms Dungeon
Polypore Dungeon
Level Points with shop
The ability to click a skill and either open a shop or teleport to the training location.
Clan Wars all portals
100% Character Design
Troll Invasion minigame
Zombies Minigame
Working Runespan - glitchy
all skill trainable
Player Owned Homes - with the ability to make objects, they dont show up but you can train construction by continuously remaking stuff
Sawmill operator 100%
all working curses
Completionists cape stand working
Torva/Pernix/Virtus degrade and can be repaired
Quest system added
Commands file tweaked/fixed
::sellall command
Over 1500 NPCs Spawned
all skill interfaces fixed
Teleport Crystal
Pking is near perfected
Donator zone
Extreme Donator Zone Halfway done
Lots more cant remember it all…
Pk/skill ECO
Shops perfected
Lucky Items and their special attacks/stats

Npc’s
King Black Dragon (737 one)
Queen Black Dragon
Tormented Demons with all prayers and attacks
Nex
Full Godwars Dungeon, with teleports and working altars ( with timers )
Corporeal beast
Frost dragons
Dominion Tower
Glacors
Nomads Requim
Bork
The Inadequancy
The Illusive
Kalphite Queen All stages and attacks

  • all matrix features
  • more.

Changelog (oudated atleast 3 months):

Fixed Skillcape/Maxcape shop
Added Set Exchange
Added 7 Custom Items, 6 NPC potions
1 Death Door position that all but kills the user
Added Sever Panel
Fixed Inadequincy
More Item Functionality Meaning Emotes for Flared Trousers, Powder Wig, Etc.
Fixed bullshit where buying stuff and it stealy your money, and gives you nothing
You can buy a double XP fishing pendent that gives you double fishing XP
Bookcases give you a helpful book that takes you to forums or gives you commands
After 10 Combat prestiges, you receive a Grandmaster ring which gives you a +50 Bonus
You can upgrade Iron, Mith, and Rune Scimitars now.
Food is sold noted
Inadequcy has been moved and given drops
Added double xp Agility pendent
Agile Set has been added to set exchange
Made Polypore Staff more powerful
Dig with spade after doing ::home and get a pet kitten
Fixed Teleports
Added Money Chest
Veng group is donators
Fixed Farming
Fixed Slayer
Added Hunting
Added Donor Shops and Recoler Shop (Donor Only)
Added Fighter Torso to Level Point Shop
Added Black Partyhat and Black Whip
Added more features to donorzone
Added ::gfx_id
Added ::emote_id
Added ::newspell
Added ::dice

changelog continued 9/26/2013:
Added player owned shops (donators)
Allow players to buy properties within game
Fixed gates to open properly
[/center]

Donators can own shops:

dlnbfc.png1360×768

2hoa91w.png1360×768

730xgg.png1360×768

Players can own strcutures in the game:

wtddnr.png1360×768

2zpuu6f.png1360×768

matrix (for client so you can log in and server so the client knows what to do in the world)
other guy who had this server last
me for a couple years developing the server and making sure things actually function properly
